caption.title: Observed age distributions, Arizona.
caption.p: Points show fraction of confirmed H1N1 or H3N2 cases observed in each single year of age. Lines show a smoothing spline fit to observed distributions. (A) All confirmed cases in the data (aggregate across all seasons). ( B-F) Age distributions from individual seasons in which both H1N1 and H3N2 circulated (seasons with â‰¥ 50 confirmed cases of each subtype are shown here. See S1 Fig. for all seasons).
